data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Behounek, G., Han, H. L., Kononenko, V. S. (2015): A revision of the genus Belciana Walker, 1862 with description of three new species (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae: Pantheinae) from East and South East Asia. Revision of Pantheinae, contribution XII. Zootaxa 4027 (3): 341-365, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4027.3.2
